channel.title: Advertising a site from a search bar
channel.description: Meh, I'm trying to advertise my site on google so when I search something related to it, it'll pop up. Like searching Moparscape will show you links that bring you there, with text under it. I went to an SMF, and the advertise by google. That didn't work. So can someone tell me how? XD

item.title: Advertising a site from a search bar
item.dc:creator: @tL tL
item.description:
@tL wrote:

I have the ‘google spiders’ Mod installed on my SMF forum you could try that if you are trying to advertise a SMF forum

Read full topic
item.source: Advertising a site from a search bar

item.title: Advertising a site from a search bar
item.dc:creator: @BobDole81 BobDole81
item.description:
@BobDole81 wrote:

It takes time for google to spider your site. I’ve never actually needed to do this before, so I don’t know specifically what works and what doesn’t. But try submitting your forums to some directories - that should help search engine optimization: http://directorycritic.com/

Read full topic
item.source: Advertising a site from a search bar
